Game.View

Class GameSettingsView

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.View.GameSettingsView

  • public class GameSettingsView
extends java.lang.Object
    Start of the game: Main screen and game settings. This class consist of initial menu and game settings.
    Version:
    1.2.0
    Author:
    Jay, ndkcha
